numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that the NBA has the highest percent of black people.
2. I noticed that the WNBA has the highest percent of black people.
3. Baseball has the lowest percent of black people.
4. I wonder why Baseball has the lowest percent of black people.
5. I thought that the percent of black people in Baseball would be higher.
6. Some famous black people were in Baseball.
8. The graph for the Women's National Basketball Association is in 2019.
9. I wonder why the graph for the Women's National Basketball Association is in 2019.
